octopus_credentials.title: Octopus Energy Credentials (Optional)
octopus_credentials.description:
Enter your Octopus Energy Spain account credentials.

⚠️ Note: Octopus Energy Spain API may not be publicly available. If you see connection errors, you can skip this step - the integration will work for price data using market sources (ESIOS/OMIE).

Property ID is optional - if left empty, we'll try to auto-detect it after authentication.

If auto-detection fails, you can find your Property ID by:
• Logging into octopusenergy.es and checking your contract details
• Looking at your Octopus Energy invoice for contract/account number
• Checking the Octopus Energy mobile app
• It may be your CUPS code (20 characters) or a numeric contract ID
